concept.description: Labels all types annotated with @javax.persistence.Entity with "JPA" and "Entity".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="javax.persistence.Entity" SET t:JPA:Entity RETURN t AS Entity

concept.description: Labels all types annotated with @javax.persistence.Embeddable with "JPA" and "Embeddable".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="javax.persistence.Embeddable" SET t:JPA:Embeddable RETURN t AS Embeddable

concept.description: Labels all fields or methods annotated with @javax.persistence.Embedded with "JPA" and "Embedded".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(member), (member)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE (member:Field or member:Method) and a.fqn="javax.persistence.Embedded" SET member:JPA:Embedded RETURN member AS Embedded

concept.description: Labels all fields or methods annotated with @javax.persistence.EmbeddedId with "JPA" and "EmbeddedId".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(member), (member)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE (member:Field or member:Method) and a.fqn="javax.persistence.EmbeddedId" SET member:JPA:EmbeddedId RETURN member AS EmbeddedId

concept.description: Labels all fields annotated with @javax.persistence.PersistenceContext with "JPA" and "PersistenceContext".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(field:Field), (field)-[:OF_TYPE]->(fieldType:Type), (field)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->(:Annotation)-[:OF_TYPE]->(:Type {fqn: 'javax.persistence.PersistenceContext'}) SET field:JPA:PersistenceContext SET fieldType:JEE:Injectable RETURN field AS Field

concept.description: Creates a node labeled with "JPA" and "NamedQuery" for each @NamedQuery defined for an entity. Furthermore a relation DEFINES is created between the entity and the named query.
concept.cypher: MATCH (entity:JPA:Entity), (entity)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->(namedQueries:Annotation)-[:OF_TYPE]-(:Type{fqn:'javax.persistence.NamedQueries'}), (namedQueries)-[:HAS]->(:Value:Array)-[:CONTAINS]->(namedQuery), (namedQuery)-[:OF_TYPE]->(:Type{fqn:'javax.persistence.NamedQuery'}), (namedQuery)-[:HAS]->(nameAttribute:Value{name:'name'}), (namedQuery)-[:HAS]->(queryAttribute:Value{name:'query'}) MERGE (entity)-[:DEFINES]->(n:JPA:NamedQuery {name:nameAttribute.value}) SET n.query=queryAttribute.value RETURN entity as Entity, n.name as Name, n.query as Query UNION ALL MATCH (entity)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->(namedQuery:Annotation), (namedQuery)-[:OF_TYPE]->(:Type{fqn:'javax.persistence.NamedQuery'}), (namedQuery)-[:HAS]->(nameAttribute:Value{name:'name'}), (namedQuery)-[:HAS]->(queryAttribute:Value{name:'query'}) MERGE (entity)-[:DEFINES]->(n:JPA:NamedQuery {name:nameAttribute.value}) SET n.query=queryAttribute.value RETURN entity as Entity, n.name as Name, n.query as Query
